narrative:
This facility meets the minimum requirements for obtaining a Class "B " license.  
The license fee should be sent to the following address:
USDA, APHIS, Animal Care
920 Main Campus Dr, Suite 200
Raleigh, NC  27606
The pre-licensing process must be completed by April 12, 2016 or the applicant will forfeit the application fee and
must wait 6 months to reapply. No regulated activity may be conducted until a valid USDA license is obtained.
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
